remarks: An inference for distributing quantifiers over a double implication. (Almost) the general statement that ~ spimfw proves.  (Contributed by BJ, 29-Sep-2019.)
statement:
bj-exalimi.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
bj-exalimi.2 $e |- ( E. x ph -> ( -. ch -> A. x -. ch ) ) $.
bj-exalimi $p |- ( E. x ph -> ( A. x ps -> ch ) ) $.
